channel.title: Is there a simple way too
channel.description:
**Changed my Question LOL*
OK. Since my other couldn't be answered I have another. Can anyone answer this. Why doesn't my Weapon Animation fully go through. This isn't rare it's like 70/30 it shows animation, the bad percentage shows him only blocking, is there anyway I can make it show my animation more fully? It still shows the hit, but it look like he hit while blocking...Any suggestions?

item.title: Is there a simple way too
item.description:
@4_2_0 wrote:

Oh ok preciate it. Well I was heavily involved in servers, mainly playing them, but of course i took priority in my school work so I just stopped all together, and i just got done with my first semester of college, and I am rediscovering my love for java and RSPS. So hopefully you may see some decent work in the near future.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a simple way too

item.title: Is there a simple way too
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Jay Sir Jay
item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

Why does 4 2 0 sound familiar from servers such as Delta and OBPK, nvm.

I’ve got a Mopar deob client for my server and it does this so i’m assuming its client-sided

Read full topic
